description: This file defines the 'StaffScreen' widget, a Flutter UI component for managing and viewing staff members. It includes search, filtering by role, listing staff cards, and actions like adding, editing, and deleting staff members.

classes.name: StaffScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays and manages staff members, including search, filter, add, edit, and delete functionalities.

classes.name: _StaffScreenState
classes.description: The internal state class for StaffScreen, managing UI state, search query, selected role, and widget behaviors.

methods.name: _showStaffForm
methods.description: Displays a dialog with a form for adding or editing a staff member.

methods.name: _deleteStaff
methods.description: Prompts user confirmation and deletes a staff member via provider.
